inventory.animalDescription: I am a very lazy and sleepy cat throughout the day.
I am a very ferocious cat and I like to scratch things up.
I am very silent when I stalk my prey and pounce on them.
I like to meow in the middle of the night and wake everybody up.
I am the cutest and most playful cat you have ever seen.
I am proud of my dad and I want to be just like him when I grow up.
I am a wild dog filled with lots of energy and stamina.
I have a pup who I am very proud of.
I like to stick my head out of a car window.
I like to bark at people when they come through the door.
